xml.bio: I am an undergraduate student at North Carolina State University, pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science. My interests include human computer interaction and intelligent tutoring systems.
xml.research: My current study is observing the interaction of students with the JavaTutor intelligent tutoring system. My moderation as a tutor will contribute to the students’ learning, engagement, and motivation to study computer science. This study will benefit research in the field of artificial intelligence in education.
